hero.title: Transform Your Brand with
hero.subtitle: Premium Printing & Digital Solutions.
hero.description: Elevate your business presence with expert Vehicle Wraps, Custom Apparel, and Web Design.

support.description: Our AI-powered 24/7 automation ensures you always have access to speed, support, and status updates.
support.quote_desc: Get pricing estimates for your projects in seconds.
support.tracking_desc: Monitor your order status from production to delivery.
support.inquiries_desc: Get answers to your questions anytime, day or night.
support.lead_desc: Express interest and our team will follow up promptly.

services_page.title: Our Services
services_page.subtitle: Comprehensive printing solutions engineered for businesses that demand excellence.

wraps.title: Large Format Printing & Wraps
wraps.desc: Dominate the road and the street. From full vehicle fleets to storefront windows and wall murals, we turn any surface into a premium advertising space.

apparel.title: Apparel & Promotional Products
apparel.desc: Build team unity and brand loyalty. We offer high-quality embroidery, screen printing, and a vast range of promotional items like mugs, pens, and bags.

digital.title: Brand Identity & Digital Solutions
digital.desc: Your brand is more than a logo. We offer full-service design packages including logo creation, flyer design, social media management, and web design.

print.title: Commercial Printing
print.desc: Essential business materials delivered with precision. Business cards, flyers, brochures, and stationery that leave a lasting impression.
